table.name: vte_hide_fields
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_hide_fields` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `module` varchar(50) NULL , `fields` varchar(255) NULL , `symbol` varchar(50) NULL , `status` int(1) NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`id`) );

table.name: vte_modules
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_modules` ( `module` varchar(50) NOT NULL , `valid` int(1) NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`module`));
